Container.Name: Krusader
Container.Description: Krusader is a fully featured file manager, highly configurable. [br][br][b][span style="color: red"]BE VERY CAREFUL AS YOU CAN DELETE THINGS YOU MAY NOT INTEND TO[br]I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR BAD DECISIONS.[/span][br]Map /UNRAID to a local folder tree you wish to perform actions on. Add other mappings manually if you wish.
Container.Overview: Krusader is a fully featured file manager, highly configurable. Full gui in a RDP container accessible via browser.
